description:
Fire and his friends encounter mysterious circumstances while visiting their school at night.  After a few bizarre run-ins, they find Pandora!  Death Mort and the Necromancer Tsukuyomi appear as well and it’s time to battle!  Thanks to Bahn’s attacks, for a moment it seemed as though Fire was victorious, but then Mort and Tsukuyomi combined and turned into Ashiyura.  The battle isn’t over, yet!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アシユラ 驚異の合体!
